_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Six qualities that make a mendicant inca: Not truly understanding which qualities make things worse
Not truly understanding which qualities keep things steady
Not truly understanding which qualities lead to distinction
Not truly understanding which qualities lead to penetration
Six qualities that make a mendicant capa: Truly understanding which qualities make things worse
Truly understanding which qualities keep things steady
Truly understanding which qualities lead to distinction
Truly understanding which qualities lead to penetration
